features: Ergonomic design, adjustable armrests, 180-degree recline, lumbar support, headrest cushion
description: The AULA Thunder X5 Gaming Chair is built for long gaming sessions. With its ergonomic design, adjustable armrests, a 180-degree recline feature, lumbar support, and a headrest cushion, it provides the utmost comfort. Made from high-quality PU leather, this chair is both durable and stylish. It can support gamers up to 300 lbs.

features: Racecar-style design, adjustable seat height, 160-degree recline, lumbar support, neck pillow
description: The AULA Alchemist Gaming Chair combines style and comfort with its racecar-style design. It features adjustable seat height, a 160-degree recline function, lumbar support, and a neck pillow for maximum comfort during long gaming sessions. Made from premium PU leather, this chair is built to last. It supports gamers up to 250 lbs.

features: RGB lighting, adjustable armrests, 170-degree recline, lumbar support, neck pillow
description: The AULA Laniro RGB Gaming Chair is a fusion of comfort and style, featuring vibrant RGB lighting. It includes adjustable armrests, a 170-degree recline feature, lumbar support, and a neck pillow for a comfortable gaming experience. Made from premium PU leather, this chair combines durability and aesthetics. It can support gamers up to 280 lbs.
